objects.description: APT28 executed CHOPSTICK by using rundll32 commands such as rundll32.exe “C:\Windows\twain_64.dll”. (Citation: Crowdstrike DNC June 2016) APT28 also executed a .dll for a first stage dropper using rundll32.exe. (Citation: Bitdefender APT28 Dec 2015) An APT28 loader Trojan saved a batch script that uses rundll32 to execute a DLL payload. (Citation: Unit 42 Playbook Sofacy Feb 2018)

external_references.description: Alperovitch, D.. (2016, June 15). Bears in the Midst: Intrusion into the Democratic National Committee. Retrieved August 3, 2016.
Bitdefender. (2015, December). APT28 Under the Scope. Retrieved February 23, 2017.
Unit 42. (2018, February 28). Unit 42 Playbook Viewer - Sofacy. Retrieved March 15, 2018.
